chunk: Directions: After cleansing and toning the skin, and 6-8 drops of serum to palm of your hand. Gently rub hands together to activate the ingredients & light press into the face. Use the pinky finger to gently apply around the eye area. Enjoy the sensorial effects while allowing the serum 1 minute to fully absorb.
book: 2867-Asklepios Garden PRIMA MATERIA Phyto-Actif Facial Serum

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
